title: Power of the Rules Committee in the House

content.prompt: The power of the Rules Committee in the House of Representatives rests on its authority to

choices.label: choose the chairs of other standing committees and issue rules for the selection of subcommittee chairs
initiate all spending legislation and hold budget hearings
place a bill on the legislative calendar, limit time for debate and determine the type of amendments allowed
determine the procedures by white nominations by the President will be approved by the House
Choose the President if no candidate wins a majority in the electoral college
